description.raw:
A few heightmap fixes in this PR:

* Fix loading DEM size in rendering when the `<size>` is not specified. It should now use the size info in the DEM file

* Enable loading DEMs with negative elevations / heights

* Fix ODE heightmap bounding box limits (models were not colliding with DEM heightmaps with certain min/max elevations)

* Fix DEM height z scale calculation. 

* Removed `try/catch` block in `Scene` when creating a heightmap - it was masking a couple of OGRE exceptions which should now be fixed.

I added some TODOs in the code as a reminder to address them later after merging forward to gazebo8 so we don't break ABI.

jenkins:

[gpu-nividia](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/676/) - ok 

[abi](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/112/API_ABI_report/) - ok

A few heightmap fixes in this PR:

  • Fix loading DEM size in rendering when the <size> is not specified. It should now use the size info in the DEM file

  • Enable loading DEMs with negative elevations / heights

  • Fix ODE heightmap bounding box limits (models were not colliding with DEM heightmaps with certain min/max elevations)

  • Fix DEM height z scale calculation.

  • Removed try/catch block in Scene when creating a heightmap - it was masking a couple of OGRE exceptions which should now be fixed.

I added some TODOs in the code as a reminder to address them later after merging forward to gazebo8 so we don't break ABI.

jenkins:

gpu-nividia - ok

abi - ok
